item.title: 这是我的第一篇博客
item.description:
测试

代码高亮

Go

import "fmt"
import "github.com/chasex/test"

func main() {
    var s string
    slice := []int{1, 2, 3}
    for _, i := range slice {
        fmt.Println(i)    
    }
}

C

#include <stdio.h>

int main() {
    // This is a test program
    printf("hello world");    
    return 0;
}

C++

#include <iostream>
#include <string>

int main () {
    std::string str;
    std::string base="The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog.";

    // used in the same order as described above:

    str.assign(base);
    std::cout << str << '\n';

    str.assign(base,10,9);
    std::cout << str << '\n';         // "brown fox"
    return 0;
}

图片
